meanings.definition: A person who dyes fabric or other materials.
meanings.sent1: The dyer carefully mixed colors to dye the cloth.
meanings.sent2: She hired a professional dyer to color her dress.
meanings.sent3: The dyer accidentally turned his white shirt pink!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a dyer, painting the world with vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The skilled dyer transformed the plain fabric into a masterpiece.

meanings.sent1: The factory installed a new dyer to speed up production.
meanings.sent2: The old dyer broke down, causing delays in the process.
meanings.sent3: The dyer hummed happily as it worked its colorful magic.
meanings.sent4: The dyer roared to life, turning the fabric into a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The efficient dyer completed the task in record time.
